value.fullName: I have seen the impact of cancer firsthand.
value.label: a. I have seen the impact of cancer firsthand.

value.fullName: My family was helped by Camp Quality, and I want to give back.
value.label: b. My family was helped by Camp Quality, and I want to give back.

value.fullName: I know someone who has benefited from Camp Quality’s work.
value.label: c. I know someone who has benefited from Camp Quality’s work.

value.fullName: A child that I know, or know of, has been diagnosed with cancer.
value.label: d. A child that I know, or know of, has been diagnosed with cancer.

value.fullName: I have been a Camp Quality volunteer and witnessed how wonderful this work is.
value.label: e. I have been a Camp Quality volunteer and witnessed how wonderful this work is.

value.fullName: During my working life I’ve dealt with children and/or cancer.
value.label: f. During my working life I’ve dealt with children and/or cancer.

value.fullName: I simply want to help children facing cancer and their families.
value.label: g. I simply want to help children facing cancer and their families.
